channel.title: Server ideas
channel.description:
Hi guys. Just creating this topic asking whether you guys have any ideas that you'd like to see implemented into the server. We don't particularly want to add any more plugins to our list, however if you feel that one deserves to be mentioned then feel free to do so. What I'm mainly after are ideas that can be built within the server to improve the players experience and make the game more enjoyable.
At the moment, what I do intend to do is:
[ul][li]'Modernise' the spawn area to include a little village and have the surrounding area safe from mobs[/li][/ul]
That's the list so far. If you have anything that you want added to it then please tell us!
Thanks.

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Why exactly do we need to reset the map? I understand the need to generate new chunks and all, but why can’t we just expand the current map a lot? I had this discussion with Moparisthebest at the start of the current map, and I agree with him that a map reset should never need to happen. We can even reset the spawn point to the new chunks if needed.

I’m not sure I can keep justifying the removal, or even devaluation of peoples work again and again, especially if there is a chance we can do it without resetting. Due to the nature of the topic it struck me that you’re asking for creative materials to assist in the community arena, if not, then somebody go ahead and organize something.

Read full topic

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @big_n12 big_n12
item.description:
@big_n12 wrote:

I guess you guys didn’t entirely understand what I mean’t

“community” games,meaning everyone can build a game and everyone can use them. Also,Tom the ability to make one is kind of limited right now and a little pointless if were talking about reseting the map

Read full topic

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“triston001, post:15, topic:510843”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=629089.msg4280349#msg4280349 date=1365451718]
I like the idea of a community games arena, although it would have to be a community project. We can’t exactly land responsibility on one person, that’d just limit progress and then to add to that; the stress of getting resources. If it’s going to be done, we’ll need to make blueprints for it and come to an agreement on what we want inside.

I also need to finish the spawn at the moment with Jamie, we’ve added farms, lit the area, etc, but we still need to add houses and other buildings of importance. Hopefully we can have that finished this week though.
[/quote]i already have 3 games i can add to it. :3[/quote]What are they?

[quote=“noobs are ftw, post:16, topic:510843”]we need more griefers[/quote]We need more players in general

Read full topic

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I like the idea of a community games arena, although it would have to be a community project. We can’t exactly land responsibility on one person, that’d just limit progress and then to add to that; the stress of getting resources. If it’s going to be done, we’ll need to make blueprints for it and come to an agreement on what we want inside.

I also need to finish the spawn at the moment with Jamie, we’ve added farms, lit the area, etc, but we still need to add houses and other buildings of importance. Hopefully we can have that finished this week though.

Read full topic

item.title: Server ideas
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Yeah it would have to be a community one and no single person can take credit for it or control it (disallowing certain players, etc). If it’s not right at spawn then there would need to be transportation from spawn to get there (rails) but it would be best if it was right at spawn.

Read full topic
